frontmatter.title: Managing React application state - without using Redux!
frontmatter.description: In this article, we are going to explore a new way of managing React application state by using hooks. We'll try to leverage the React.useContext and React.useReducer hooks to manage our application state without using redux.

frontmatter.title: Managing React application state - without using Redux!
frontmatter.brief: Redux has always been a developer's first choice for managing React application state. In this article, we will discuss managing the global state of a react application without using our most loved library for the purpose.
